```{r}
wordle_test <- function(guess, true.word)
{
  result = rep(0,5)
  for(i in 1:5){
    letter1 = substr(guess, i, i)
    if(grepl(letter1, true.word, fixed = TRUE)) {
      result[i] = 1
      if(substr(true.word, i, i) == letter1)
        result[i] = 2
    }
  }
  return(result)
}



wordle_test("scary", "slump")
```


```{r}
words %>% 
  filter(
    word_length == 5,
    substr(word, 2,2) == "o",
    substr(word, 3,3) == "r",
    substr(word, 5,5) == "e",
    grepl("e", word, fixed = TRUE),
    !grepl("a", word, fixed = TRUE),
    !grepl("l", word, fixed = TRUE),
    !grepl("s", word, fixed = TRUE),
    !grepl("c", word, fixed = TRUE),
    !grepl("h", word, fixed = TRUE),
    !grepl("d", word, fixed = TRUE),
    !grepl("u", word, fixed = TRUE),
    !grepl("v", word, fixed = TRUE)
  ) 
```

```{r}
position = 1
words %>% 
  filter(
    word_length == 5
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    pos_letter = substr(word, position, position)
  ) %>%
  group_by(pos_letter) %>%
  summarize(
    count = n()
  ) %>%
  arrange(desc(count))
```
